conclusion: Analyze the flow path of the liquid from points A, B, and C to determine which container it will flow into.
Liquid from point A flows downward and to the left, passing through the brown baffle.
Liquid from point A will eventually reach container D.
Liquid from point B flows downward and to the right, passing through the red baffle.
Liquid from point B will eventually reach container E.
Liquid from point C flows downward and to the left, passing through the yellow baffle.
Liquid from point C will eventually reach container D.
Liquid from points A and C will flow into container D, and liquid from point B will flow into container E.
